title: Supposedly Spooky's Sanity Sabotage
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

This page is under //heavy// construction, because I like construction.

[[tabview]]
[[tab A Basic Introduction to Insanity and His Offspring]]

> My babies, my little infantile insects even.

> **[[[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5807 |Pelicans Three, AKA SCP-5807]]]** 
> My first and unnecessarily long SCP about three cool pelicans that deal with the concept of loss.[[footnote]] In hindsight, the way I went about it was really shallow and not at all realistic, but hey, the downvote button has to have a purpose. [[/footnote]]

> **[[[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5339 |And He Rose Again With a Third Leg, AKA SCP-5339]]]**
> This one is about a malformed child who was not murdered by his mother.

> **[[[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5622 |Your Indoor Neighbor, AKA SCP-5622]]]**
> I don't like this one.

> **[[[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5739 |ELEPHANT HIDE, AKA SCP-5793]]]**
> My pride, my joy, my mass collection of skin animated to preserve the souls of its victims inside a living hull.

> **[[[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6107 |Diseases of the Skin, AKA SCP-6107]]]**
> Some people are born with their skin missing. Sometimes it grows over every orifice so they cannot breathe or eat without carving holes in it, and it's not their fault; it's just a sad part of life.

[[/tab]]
[[tab "Art"]]
I make art.[[footnote]] I like to alternate from extreme surrealist imagery and found footage. [[/footnote]]

[[image dontdoitdontsayit.jpg size="medium"]]

[[image dermalscreeching.jpg size="medium"]]

[[image nonsensesequitur.jpg size="medium"]]

[[image winifred.jpg size="medium"]]

You can also check out more of my work at https://www.instagram.com/supposedly_spooky/


[[/tab]]
[[tab Related Incidents and Repeated Inquiries]]
* I use Procreate to draw stuff
* I also make [[[https://supposedly-spooky.itch.io/ |games]]]

[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]
author: Supposedly Spooky
